ygData.subject: Re: Faction -- Dark Elves in Neriak?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have heard, Im not sure, but if you kill High Elf guards you will get better faction with Dark Elf. Avari lvl 17wiz ... From: Erdrick@hotmail.com
ygData.messageBody:
I have heard, Im not sure, but if you kill High Elf guards you will get
better faction with Dark Elf.

Avari lvl 17wiz
-----Original Message-----
From: Erdrick@... <Erdrick@...>; TheRegulators
<pornstarpat@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, July 03, 1999 11:41 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Faction -- Dark Elves in Neriak?


>From: Erdrick@..., TheRegulators <pornstarpat@...>
>
>Anyone have ANY ideas how to gain faction with the Dark Elves in Nek Forest
>and Neriak? Since the implementation of faction hits for PvP I am now
>regarded dubiously by most of the guards and have some Drow brethren who
>cannot enter the forest safely anymore. Yes, it is my own fault for the
>most part, but how can I fix it? GMs and Guides can't help, other players
>that I have talked with so far haven't been of much help, either. I was
>told to try the Halflings that roam Nek Forest, but that was misleading.
>Even the Leatherfoot Deputy doesn't help you gain faction in Neriak. I
just
>heard tonight to try Lavastorm and Najena, but I had been there for many,
>many levels and haven't noticed any gains. Any advice would be most
>appreciated. Thanks.
>
>Erdrick, The Regulators
>www.theregulators.org
>(Rallos Zek)
>
